title: Develop a Creative Brief
description: A project manager needs to write a creative brief for the design team for an upcoming social media campaign.

tasks.description: Gather all campaign details: objective, target audience, key message, and deliverables.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information from the main campaign plan.

tasks.description: Fill out a standardized creative brief template with the gathered information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates all sections of the brief, including background, goals, and specs.

tasks.description: Share the completed brief with the creative team and schedule a kickoff meeting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent distributes the brief and sets up the required meeting.
